00026 #pragma once
00027 
00028 #include <l4/sys/capability>
00029 #include <l4/re/protocols>
00030 
00031 namespace L4Re {
00032 
00057 class L4_EXPORT Namespace :
00058   public L4::Kobject_t<Namespace, L4::Kobject, L4Re::Protocol::Namespace>
00059 {
00060   L4_KOBJECT(Namespace)
00061 
00062 public:
00066   enum Register_flags
00067   {
00068     Ro        = L4_CAP_FPAGE_RO,   
00069     Rw        = L4_CAP_FPAGE_RW,   
00070     Rs        = L4_CAP_FPAGE_RS,
00071     Rws       = L4_CAP_FPAGE_RWS,
00072     Strong    = L4_CAP_FPAGE_S,    
00073     Trusted   = 0x008,
00074 
00075     Cap_flags = Ro | Rw | Strong | Trusted,
00076 
00077     Partly_resolved = 0x020,
00078     Link      = 0x100,
00079     Overwrite = 0x200,
00080   };
00081 
00082   enum Query_timeout
00083   {
00084     To_default      = 3600000,
00085     To_non_blocking = 0,
00086     To_forever      = ~0,
00087   };
00088 
00104   long query(char const *name, L4::Cap<void> const &cap,
00105              int timeout = To_default,
00106              l4_umword_t *local_id = 0, bool iterate = true) const throw();
00107 
00124   long query(char const *name, unsigned len, L4::Cap<void> const &cap,
00125              int timeout = To_default,
00126              l4_umword_t *local_id = 0, bool iterate = true) const throw();
00127 
00142   long register_obj(char const *name, L4::Cap<void> const &obj,
00143                     unsigned flags = Rw) const throw();
00144 
00145   long unlink(char const *name) throw();
00146   long link(char const *name, unsigned len,
00147             L4::Cap<L4Re::Namespace> src_dir,
00148             char const *src_name, unsigned src_len,
00149             unsigned flags = Rw) throw();
00150 
00151 private:
00152   long _query(char const *name, unsigned len,
00153               L4::Cap<void> const &target, l4_umword_t *local_id,
00154               bool iterate) const throw();
00155 
00156 };
00157 
00158 };
